name: Lodz Academic Foundation
goal: The Łódź Academic Foundation deals with the development of entrepreneurship among people with disabilities and training in the area of higher education. The organization also focuses on the promotion of pro-health attitudes in society.
interests: Climate Action, Education and training, Energy, Public Health, Research and innovation, Taxation
euInitiatives:
European Fund for Strategic Investments
Cohesion policy
Health policy
Framework Program Horizon Europe
